meanings.definition: A law or regulation made by a city or town government.
meanings.sent1: The city council passed an ordinance to regulate parking in the downtown area.
meanings.sent2: The new ordinance prohibits loud music after 10 PM in residential areas.
meanings.sent3: The ordinance requiring dogs to wear hats at the park made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The ordinance to keep the streets clean was a breath of fresh air for the community.
meanings.sent5: The ordinance on recycling was as clear as a sunny day.

meanings.sent1: The king issued an ordinance for all citizens to attend the royal ball.
meanings.sent2: The company's CEO issued an ordinance for all employees to undergo training.
meanings.sent3: The ordinance to wear silly hats on Fridays was unexpected but fun.
meanings.sent4: The ordinance to work harder came down like a thunderbolt on the employees.
meanings.sent5: The ordinance to smile more brightened up the workplace.

meanings.sent1: The priest performed the ordinance of baptism for the newborn baby.
meanings.sent2: The ordinance of marriage is a sacred union between two individuals.
meanings.sent3: The ordinance of singing hymns in the morning brought peace to the congregation.
meanings.sent4: The ordinance of confession cleansed the soul like a gentle rain.
meanings.sent5: The ordinance of communion was a symbol of unity among believers.
